title: No better time to be in India than now: Wyndham Exec
description: Wyndham will launch its first luxury hotel in India next year with the opening of the Wyndham Grand in Udaipur. Additionally, they plan to form strategic alliances with white label operators to expand their presence. Wyndham operates 60 hotels in India and has 45 more in the pipeline, with new openings this year in various cities.
